name: dm.pl4ios
shortDescription: iOS 11.x and above supported. Install dm.pl for iOS devices. Dm.pl can be used instead of and alongside of dpkg. Dm.pl however includes a way to package debs  in lzma compression. Dpkg by coolstar does not support lzma compression. Type dm.pl for a man page. Type dm.plscriptlicense for the license of the dm.pl script. Type lzmadeb for a short tutorial on how to make deb files on iOS 11 with lzma compression.
author: ally
